allow: Bash(zsh -i -c 'echo """"=== Test Results ==="""" && echo """"Zinit installed: $(test -d ~/.local/share/zinit/zinit.git && echo YES || echo NO)"""" && echo """"ZSH (oh-my-zsh): $ZSH"""" && echo """"Syntax highlighting: $(test -d ~/.local/share/zinit/plugins/zsh-users---zsh-syntax-highlighting && echo LOADED || echo NOT_LOADED)"""" && echo """"=== Test complete ===""""')
